entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 07:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this morning. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
